spec_data.Name: ncid-kpopup
spec_data.Description:
The NCID kpopup module displays Caller ID information in a KDE pop-up window
and optionally speaks the number via voice synthesis.  The KDE or Gnome
desktop must be running.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 07:36:18 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: NCID kpopup module displays Caller ID info in a KDE window
